meanings.definition: Of or relating to a monarch or monarchy.
meanings.sent1: The royal family lived in a grand monarchic palace.
meanings.sent2: The crown jewels symbolized the monarchic power.
meanings.sent3: The monarchic crown sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.
meanings.sent4: Her influence over the court was as monarchic as a queen bee in a hive.
meanings.sent5: The monarchic rule was evident in every aspect of the kingdom.

meanings.definition: Characteristic of a monarch or monarchy.
meanings.sent1: The monarchic decree was followed by all subjects.
meanings.sent2: The grandeur of the palace reflected the monarchic style.
meanings.sent3: The monarchic robes were so heavy, they made the king stumble comically.
meanings.sent4: His presence was as monarchic as a lion among the forest animals.
meanings.sent5: The monarchic influence was felt throughout the land.
